title: Home feed spacing adjustment between Stories and first post

requirements.summary: Reduce the vertical gap between the Stories row and the first PostCard on the Home page while preserving the existing 2-column feed + right-side suggestions layout on lg screens.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the vertical gap between the bottom of the Stories row and the top of the first PostCard is visibly reduced compared to the current implementation.
No overlap occurs between Stories and the first PostCard; spacing remains consistent across common breakpoints (mobile and lg desktop).
The right-side 'Suggested for you' panel remains in its current column and alignment on lg screens.

file_operations.description: Adjust the Tailwind spacing classes controlling vertical layout in the left column so the gap between <StoriesRow /> and the post feed container is smaller (e.g., remove/replace the parent space-y-* and apply a smaller responsive margin between StoriesRow and the first post), while keeping the existing grid structure and the lg right-side suggestions column unchanged.
